title: Critical Deviation - ProcessStep Issue - Paracetamol
description: Crystallization step incomplete resulting in poor crystal formation
root_cause: Cooling rate too rapid due to chiller malfunction

resolution.action_taken: Deviation investigated per SOP-DEV-001. Root cause analysis completed identifying: Cooling rate too rapid due to chiller malfunction. Corrective actions implemented as per linked CAPA. CAPA in progress with interim controls established.

title: Major Deviation - Equipment Issue - Ibuprofen
description: Pump failure during material transfer operation
root_cause: Seal degradation due to chemical compatibility issues

resolution.action_taken: Deviation investigated per SOP-DEV-001. Root cause analysis completed identifying: Seal degradation due to chemical compatibility issues. Corrective actions implemented as per linked CAPA. CAPA completed successfully with preventive measures in place.

title: Minor Deviation - Equipment Issue - Atorvastatin Calcium
description: Valve positioning error during automated sequence operation

resolution.action_taken: Deviation investigated per SOP-DEV-001. Root cause analysis completed identifying: Actuator position feedback sensor drift. Corrective actions implemented as per linked CAPA. CAPA completed successfully with preventive measures in place.

description: Pump failure during material transfer operation
root_cause: Seal degradation due to chemical compatibility issues

resolution.action_taken: Deviation investigated per SOP-DEV-001. Root cause analysis completed identifying: Seal degradation due to chemical compatibility issues. Corrective actions implemented as per linked CAPA. CAPA in progress with interim controls established.

title: Major Deviation - BatchComponent Issue - Amlodipine Besylate
description: Component identity test failure during incoming inspection

resolution.action_taken: Deviation investigated per SOP-DEV-001. Root cause analysis completed identifying: Mislabeled material from supplier warehouse. Corrective actions implemented as per linked CAPA. CAPA completed successfully with preventive measures in place.
